}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *NVG44X XDSL VOICE GATEWAY, FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/GZ5NVG4XX GZ5NVG4XX] :VDSL2, ADSL2+ Gateways with 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Voice optional
Models available: *NVG443B: VDSL2/ADSL2+ Gateway 2.4/5 GHz 802.11abgn/ac *NVG448B: VDSL2/ADSL2+ Gateway 2.4/5 GHz 802.11abgn/ac and VoIP *NVG448BQ - DSL/FTTH Gateway for Vantage, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ *NVG468MQ - FTTH Gateway for FiOS/MoCA, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ
===Specifications=== Concurrent Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac :Antenna: 5x int. omni-directional antennas with diversity *2.4 GHz support: 2x2 (or 3x3 for BQ/MQ - [[Broadcom]]) *5 GHz support: 3x3 (or 4x4 for BQ/MQ - [[Quantenna]]) Interfaces: *WAN - Single line or bonded VDSL2, ADSL2+, RJ-14 :One-port 10/100/1000 Ethernet (RJ-45) *LAN – Four-port 10/100/1000 Ethernet switch, RJ-45 :Single-port, dual line voice FXS, RJ-14. *USB 3.0 port, network interface (optional)
The manual states the default IP is 192.168.1.254.
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31139536-New-Gateways-FiOS-Vantage-Arris-NVG448BQ-NVG468MQ-NVG448B-NVG443B ''Pace NVG443B/NVG448B/NVG448BQ/NVG468MQ'' on '''DSLReports''']
==See also== :[[Arris]] • [[Pace]] *[[Arris NVG443B]] - VDSL2 CPE [[Broadcom]] BCM63148, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XX *Arris NVG448B - VDSL2 CPE [[Broadcom]] BCM63148, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XX *[[Arris NVG448BQ]] - DSL/FTTH Gateway for Vantage, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ *[[Arris NVG468MQ]] - FTTH Gateway for FiOS/MoCA, FCC ID: GZ5NVG4XXQ *[[Arris NVG599]] *[[Arris NVG595]] *[[Pace 5168NV]]-110 (Arris Global Limited) - [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 *[[Pace 5268AC]] (Arris Global Limited) [[Broadcom]] - BCM63168 ([https://www.iol.unh.edu/testing/broadband/gvector/equipment testing])
